title: Get "Unknown" value for the publisher or the product version field
content:
You might see the Unknown error in either of the following cases:

  1. On the Products page, the Publisher field of a product in the product list is <Unknown>.
  2. In the product version list on the General tab of a product, the specific version next to the product name appears as <Unknown>.

Cause

  1. The discovered_vendor attribute of the installed software isn't discovered from UCMDB.
  2. The release attribute of the installed software isn't discovered from UCMDB.

Solution

Make sure the discovered_vendor attribute and the release attribute of the installed software have values in UCMDB.

It's advisable that you use the Inventory Discovery by Scanner job to discover the installed software. In this way, the two attributes will be automatically populated with values for the installed software.
